file_content.text: When Balmorra was occupied, the Empire offered "retirement incentives" to her government. But when officials went to claim these "incentives", they... they vanished.
You know, I've heard a lot about you. Particularly that business on Alderaan, very interesting.
We do appreciate the rescue, Jedi. Even if the others won't admit it.
Please. We can't leave Balmorra under Imperial control. Her people deserve our help.
